### Shadow

_Flitting, sentient shadows in the vague shape of a human._

**LV** 3, **AL** C
**AC** 12, **HP** 15, **MV** near (fly)
**ATK** 2 touch +2 (1d4 + drain)

|  S  |  D  |  C  |  I  |  W  |  Ch  |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:----:|
| -4 | 2 | 2 | -2 | 0 | -1 |

**Drain:** Target takes 1 STR damage. At 0 STR, target dies and becomes a shadow.
